dmca.title: Copyright infringement - www.drunkreport.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Ellen Herb/CORPHQ/NYTIMES [mailto:herbe@nytimes.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 14, 2005 10:39 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright infringement - www.drunkreport.com

To:   Lance Crosby, Esq., Chief Operating Officer
      Theplanet.com Internet Services

Please read the attached letter from Nancy Richman, attorney with The New
York Times Company Legal Department.

Thank you.

(See attached file: drunkreport.pdf)

Ellen Herb
The New York Times Company
Legal Department
229 W. 43d Street   12th floor
New York, NY  10036
(ph)  212-556-1920
(fax) 212-556-4634
